overview: A young Honduran immigrant and a mother, whose son wants to confine her in a residence, decide to go to Huelva. During the trip they are forced to run away from several pursuers, attack a service station, face the Guardia Civil and meet a false Englishman who changes their lives. Nevertheless, their goal is to arrive to a nightclub called Mami Blue, venue of an unexpected end.
title: Mami blue
